aircraft.value: Talon Swift - AC-6347-258 at Regional Depot-C

defect_observed.value: Access panel hinge failure. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Tail Assembly component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 03/06/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 05/06/2023 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 08/06/2023 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 08/06/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 11/06/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

a) Root Cause Analysis: Age-related degradation of elastomeric components
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Tail Assembly component. Analysis of
operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation

ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
